mapper.update: update alarm set alarm_status = 'Y' where alarm_send_id = #{alarmSendId} AND alarm_recieve_id = #{alarmRecieveId} AND alarm_status = 'N'
mapper.select: select al.alarm_send_id, al.alarm_recieve_id, al.alarm_status, al.alarm_title, al.alarm_contents, bimg.brn_image_name, bimg.brn_image_path, bimg.brn_image_status FROM alarm al, brn_image bimg where al.alarm_send_id = bimg.member_id AND al.alarm_Status = #{alarmStatus} AND al.alarm_recieve_id = 'Admin'
